name: @jcu/cookbook
description: The web UI framework for building responsive, mobile-first web projects with University styling
author: JCU eResearch Centre

scripts.css: npm-run-all css-deps css-compile css-prefix css-minify css-copy
scripts.css-deps: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p dist/fonts/open-sans dist/fonts/playfair-display dist/fonts/mdi && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@fontsource/open-sans/files/* dist/fonts/open-sans/ && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@fontsource/playfair-display/files/* dist/fonts/playfair-display/ && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@mdi/font/fonts/* dist/fonts/mdi/
scripts.css-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/css/ dist/fonts/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.css-main: npm-run-all css-lint css-compile-main css-prefix-main css-minify-main css-copy
scripts.img-optimise: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p dist/img && cross-env-shell shx cp -r src/img dist/ && find dist/img -type d -exec imagemin {}/* --out-dir={} \;
scripts.img-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/img/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.js-deps: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p dist/js && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min* node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/* dist/js/
scripts.js-copy: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r dist/js/ site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/
scripts.docs-deps-js: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/assets/js/ && cross-env-shell shx cp node_modules/@khanacademy/tota11y/dist/tota11y.min.js site/docs/$npm_package_version_short/dist/js/
scripts.release-cdn: rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook:jcu-cdn-cookbook/public/$npm_package_version/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook:jcu-cdn-cookbook/public/$npm_package_version_short/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook:jcu-cdn-cookbook/public/$npm_package_version_major/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook:jcu-cdn-cookbook/public/latest/
scripts.release-cdn-test: rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook-test:jcu-cdn-cookbook-test/public/$npm_package_version/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook-test:jcu-cdn-cookbook-test/public/$npm_package_version_short/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook-test:jcu-cdn-cookbook-test/public/$npm_package_version_major/ && rclone sync dist/ jcu-cdn-cookbook-test:jcu-cdn-cookbook-test/public/latest/
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --watch node_modules/jquery/dist --watch node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd --watch node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js --ext js --exec "npm run js"
scripts.build: npm-run-all css-lint* css img js docs
